title: This Gaming Keyboard is really ADVANCED! - ASUS ROG Claymore II
description: Thanks to ASUS ROG for sponsoring today's video! Purchase ROG Claymore II:  Learn more about ROG Claymore II:  Learn more about ROG RX Switches:   Is the gaming peripheral industry heading in this direction? Gaming keyboards aren't new, and modular, wireless, also optical switches aren't too. The ASUS ROG Claymore II gaming keyboard has all of that in one package, and it's fairly interesting with all those features and more combined.   Buy ASUS ROG Gladius II Gaming Mouse On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):  On B&H (PAID LINK):   Buy ASUS ROG PG259QN 360hz Gaming Monitor On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):  On B&H (PAID LINK):   Check out the Maingear Turbo Gaming PC we used at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
